title: Event Step Configuration
description: Event-driven step that manages welcome email sequences with multiple trigger types for comprehensive onboarding workflows.

title: Welcome Sequence Management
description: Creates and manages welcome email sequences with step tracking, timing, and completion status for new user onboarding.

title: Sequence Trigger Processing
description: Processes different sequence triggers (start, progression, timer) with appropriate email sending and scheduling logic.

title: Email Scheduling Logic
description: Schedules welcome emails with appropriate delays and handles engagement-based progression for optimal user experience.

title: Welcome Email Content Generation
description: Generates personalized welcome email content with step-specific templates and user data integration.

title: Sequence Completion Tracking
description: Tracks sequence completion with engagement metrics and emits completion events for analytics and follow-up campaigns.
